ie.gmit.sw.words

Class Bounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.words.Bounds

  • public class Bounds
extends java.lang.Object
    Bounds is class used to implement basic 2D Box detection when placing the words.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andy Sweeney - G00237144

      • Bounds

        public Bounds(int w,
              int h,
              Bounds bounds)
        Constructor that takes a height,width and a bounds object
        Parameters:
        w - the width for the word
        h - the height for the word
        bounds - a bounds object which the x and y position are taken from and assigned to this class

    • Method Detail

      • doIAvoidCollision

        public boolean doIAvoidCollision(Bounds checkMe,
                                 int bufferSpace)
        Takes a bounds object and checks if it collides with this bounds object
        Parameters:
        checkMe - the other bounds object that is passed in for collision detection
        bufferSpace - the buffer space for the text so the text doesnt crowd too closely together when placing
        Returns:
        a Boolean on whether this bounds collides with the bounds object passed in
